I've started to write short stories in my spare time.
I decided to turn my life around and focus on my passions.
I spend time in nature to make myself feel younger.
i often do not have the money to pay my utility bills.
I am Hispanic and my friends are my family.

participant_2.background:
I check my phone to see if there are any messages.
i work as a stand up comedian.
I'm an adult who likes to have some time to myself.
i am currently listening to bach.
I am a middle-aged woman who lives in New Mexico with my dog and cat.

content.text: Good! I'm listening to Bach. How about you?
I'm good! I'm working on some short stories in my spare time.
Oh, that's awesome! I love writing! What's it about?
It's a fantasy story about a young woman who goes on a journey to save her kingdom.
That sounds really cool! I'd love to read it when you're done.
Thanks! I'm glad you like it!
So, what do you do for a living?
Oh, that's cool! I've always wanted to be a teacher.
It's a lot of fun! I love working with kids.
I bet! Do you teach at a public or private school?
I teach at a public school.
Nice! I've heard that public schools are really tough to work at.
Yeah, they can be. But it's worth it when you see how much you're helping your students.
That's a great attitude to have!
Thanks! I try to stay positive.
